title: Malzahar or Riven
body: I main mid and some times play top lane, I really really like the idea of Riven however i'm worried ill be really bad with her. The only reason i'm considering Malzahar is because he's apparently overpowered even though my friends say he's boring. I think I would prefer Riven but i'm kind of worried about the skill cap.

replies.body:
How do you do soo much damage on riven? 
Like i seen some people destroy the enemy team instantly, yet i do 0 damage to the enemy team.
I try to Q AA Q AA Q AA to maximise my damage output, but it doesn't feel like my damage is there.
Any tips on how to maximise the damage output on riven?

Sure! I suggest you grab the right runes and masteries on Riven first! Have a look at my first rune page and my Riven masteries :) Your combo is correct, just make sure you use your W in either ur first Q or second Q and do the animation cancel from start to finish. So check your runes and masteries and if you want to try mine out you can! Build bc, hydra and yommus or you can try lord dominics or grevious if they have healing. Always animation cancel and use ur basic attacks to maximise rivens damage. Running fevor is the way for me because you do so much damage overtime. If you still need help please reply to me :)
I got the right runes for Riven, do you think it's because the tank meta is too strong for Riven?

It depends because Riven's weakness is alot of armor anyway however, you can beat tanks early game, just get loads of armor pen as I suggested to you before :) Riven sits at a good win rate and is "balanced" however we are getting Riven buffs soon! So I am sure we won't have a problem with tanks :) just play right and build right to shred everyone, especially the tank. Hope this helps! If I didn't answer you properly please tell me what else you need :)

Hello Krimzonn! Riven main here that would like to help you out!
It is essential you know how to animation cancel with her as she is a high mechanical champ and has a ton of combos! I suggest watching some clips on Youtube on how to do that and also watch BoxBox. He is a streamer that only plays Riven and in every match he explains what he does when he vses other champs. Just make sure to practice and don't give up as she takes skill. If you need a hand on anything else please ask me and I will help as best as I can! :)
Holy damn! can you help me too?!
Sure what would you like help with? :)

I play alot of riven so i have 100K mastery points but i always lost the Gnar matchup even tho its slighty favored for riven
any tips?

Sure! Like with any ranged you must play safe. I don't personally like maxing E because it sacrifices alot of Rivens damage. Capitalize on the gnar cooldowns so you can trade well. Wait out the big Gnar so that you can all in ult and he won't have ult. Study his early game. If he plays really agressive against you. Play safe and bring the minions to your tower and call for a gank. If his not abusing his range then you can trade as he is most likely scared of you. Always rush black cleaver first as he will be tanky. When I usually trade initiate with E so you absorb his damage. Study his moves and capitalise on his cooldowns. And don't be afraid if he is bad! You are made to be a duelist! :) Hope this helps!

I have both champions and honestly if you are the type of player who likes doing flashy plays then go riven but if you want to play a overpowered champion who is not really difficult to play then go play malzhar.

There is so many combos for riven and she is really fun to play, with malzhar it's different, malzhar basically has only 1 or 2 combos and isn't really a champion that you can make flashy plays with.

So if you are a Zed type of player then go riven
If you are a Anivia type of player then go Malzhar
